period_from.title: Period from date [including]
period_from.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. If left empty, all records are downloaded.

incremental_output.title: Load type
incremental_output.description: If set to Incremental update, the result tables will be updated based on primary key. Full load overwrites the destination table each time. NOTE: If you wish to remove deleted records, this needs to be set to Full load and the Period from attribute empty.

property_attributes.title: Property additional attributes
property_attributes.description: Add additional attributes to each custom property. NOTE: Applicable for Contacts, Companies and Deals.

include_versions.title: Include attribute versions
include_versions.description: A list of previous versions of the property. The first item in the list will be the current version

include_source.title: Include source attribute
include_source.description: The method by which this version was set.

include_timestamp.title: Include timestamp attribute
include_timestamp.description: A Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) of the time when this version was set
